verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We revealed it on the Night of Predestination.
Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Night of Power is!

verses.text_ar: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.

verses.text_ar: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The angels and the Spirit descend therein, by the permission of their Lord, with all decrees.
(The night is) Peace until the rising of the dawn.
